mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pa_blacklist(id, name, idCard, phone, imsi, imei, orgName, apiQueryDate, returnValue) values(seq_tbl_pa_blacklist.nextval, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{imsi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiQueryDate}, #{returnValue})

insert into tbl_pa_blacklist_zh(id, name, idCard, phone, imsi, imei, orgName, apiQueryDate, returnValue) values(seq_tbl_pa_blacklist_zh.nextval, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{imsi}, #{imei}, #{orgName}, #{apiQueryDate}, #{returnValue})
